pullRequest.title: Store versions of submissions in database
pullRequest.bodyText:
Server: I implemented the changes with a good performance and prevented too many database calls
 Server: I documented the Java code using JavaDoc style.

Motivation and Context
In team-based Modeling and Text Exercises, we currently do not know which student contributed to the team submission. This is a first step towards evaluating individual students contributions for team submissions. So far it only persists any updates made towards modeling and text submissions to the database in the form of submission versions.
Description

add new entity SubmissionVersion that belongs to a Submission and a User (author) and keeps track of the submission content
when a text or modeling submission is saved, also save a submission version for it (if it's the same user as the one who created the last version, simply update the last version, otherwise create a new one)

Screenshots
